WRD_Laezel.synopsis: You speak to Lae'zel after the choke point confrontation with a githyanki knight. She is absolutely infuriated - and, though she doesn't outwardly show it, frightened. She may have been targeted by her own queen.
WRD_Laezel.how_to_trigger: Debug book: add Lae'Zel to your partyDebug book: go to the Plains, near the gith chokepointteleport -130, 542Skip through that dialogueApproach the githTake a branch through the gith chokepoint dialogue that will end in hostility, so fail a check or attack them.ReCon: killcombatLae'Zel should speak to you, triggering GLO_GithChokepoint_WRD_Laezel.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint.synopsis: Laezel reaction for the Gith Chokepoint meeting
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint.how_to_trigger: Plays after dealing with the Gith at the chokepoint

WRD_Laezel_1.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_1.text: Shka'keth! I have followed protocol. He does not speak for Vlaakith!
WRD_Laezel_1.context: NodeContext: Infuriated, suspicious. SHKA-keth. Like it is spelled, a but guttural. He is calling the knight that flew off an ASSHOLE!

WRD_Laezel_14.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_14.text: We carry the weapon he seeks. It must be powerful, for a kith'rak to betray his own queen's children.

WRD_Laezel_2.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_2.text: And you. I trusted you. Must every ally betray me?

WRD_Laezel_13.speaker: Player
WRD_Laezel_13.text: Betray? The knight seemed to act on Vlaakith's behalf.

WRD_Laezel_8.speaker: Player
WRD_Laezel_8.text: Betray? The knight seemed to act on Vlaakith's behalf.

WRD_Laezel_0.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_0.text: I have devoted my life to my queen. I will be her chosen. It is my due!

WRD_Laezel_4.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_4.text: Search the bodies. We might find a way to the crèche.
WRD_Laezel_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks at bodies.NodeContext: Lae'zel takes a moment to breathe, then gains control of her anger. She speaks calmly and coldly.

WRD_Laezel_3.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_3.text: And beware the skies. We are watched.

WRD_Laezel_17.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_17.text: Forward, through the pass - the crèche is near.
WRD_Laezel_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel looks at bodies.NodeContext: Lae'zel takes a moment to breathe, then gains control of her anger. She speaks calmly and coldly.

WRD_Laezel_11.speaker: Player
WRD_Laezel_11.text: Sorry. I shouldn't have acted that way.

WRD_Laezel_9.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_9.text: You inflict the wound, then expect to heal it with 'sorries'. Keep them.

WRD_Laezel_10.speaker: Player
WRD_Laezel_10.text: Control your temper and focus. We must be very close to the crèche.

WRD_Laezel_6.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_6.text: You dare take the high road after digging our trench? Spare me.

WRD_Laezel_7.speaker: Player
WRD_Laezel_7.text: Control your temper and focus. We must be very close to the crèche.

WRD_Laezel_5.speaker: Player
WRD_Laezel_5.text: Look upward. The dragon-rider will return, I am sure of it.

WRD_Laezel_16.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_16.text: Yes. We must move, and quickly.

WRD_Laezel_19.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_Laezel_19.text: This weapon must be powerful, for a kith'rak to betray his own queen's children.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_20.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_20.context: NodeContext: Seething but not too much.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_5.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_5.text: You did well to intervene, vexed as I am to admit it. The Jhe'stil Kith'rak would have flayed our skin and left our carcasses to burn in the sun -

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_94.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_94.text: - all for the sake of the artefact that we carry.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_77.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_77.text: - all for the sake of this polyhedric 'weapon'.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_101.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_101.text: I required your silence, and you made me a mockery!

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_38.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_38.text: A kith'rak demanded my head. He'd deny me a cure.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_7.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_7.text: Bah - this is a distraction. The kith'rak deserves the whole of my scorn.
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel pauses, then turns her anger to the knight that flew offNodeContext: Lae'zel pauses, then turns her anger to the knight that flew off

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_66.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_66.text: How dare he speak my queen's name!  How dare he dishonour her child!
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is over the top mad. She should be visually raging here.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_40.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_40.text: Wasn't he acting on your queen's command?

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_100.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_100.text: Do not be naive. I. Followed. Protocol. I've earned Vlaakith's favour.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_59.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_59.text: Shka'keth! Keep your hands off me.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_89.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_89.text: I will remove the parasite. I will see the kith'rak dead, and present his corpse to Vlaakith herself.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_60.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_60.text: Show me pity again, and I will present your corpse instead.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_95.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_95.text: The crèche is near, this much we know. We follow the path forward and into the valley.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_36.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_36.text: A crèche is near, that much is certain. We follow the path forward and seek signs of githyanki settlers.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_47.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_47.text: No one, not even the ignoble Jhe'stil Kith'rak, will keep me from my purification.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_82.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_82.text: Given how badly that went, what do you plan to do next?

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_104.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_104.text: I will remove the parasite. I will see the kith'rak dead, and present his head to Vlaakith herself.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_51.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_51.text: And I will leave behind this wretched realm to stand at my queen's right hand.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_52.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_52.text: Then we will see the queen's justice done.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_103.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_103.text: The kith'rak was following Vlaakith's orders.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_27.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_27.text: Calm yourself - save your anger for your queen's enemies.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_1.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_1.text: Calm yourself - save your anger for your queen's enemies.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_108.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_108.text: Yes. Judicious counsel - and vexing, given the source.
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel's breathing slows. She calms. NodeContext: Lae'zel is calming down.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_107.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_107.text: I am a child of Gith. l will abide by protocol and seek the crèche ghustil, as Vlaakith has taught.
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_107.context: NodeContext: VARSH = as it is spelled

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_97.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_97.text: And then - then I will skewer the heretic with his own silver sword.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_61.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_61.text: Tas'ki! My rage is endless, I assure you.
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel remains angry.NodeContext: TAH-ski. Remains angry.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_55.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_55.text: I will remove the parasite. I will see the kith'rak dead.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_26.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_26.text: And I will offer his head to Vlaakith herself.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_80.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_80.text: A kith'rak demanded my head. I should have given him yours.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_28.speaker: Narrator
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_28.text: *Your skull trembles; your parasite wriggles. Lae'zel sees your memories of your confrontation with Kith'rak Voss.*

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_67.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_67.text: Voss! Jhe'stil Kith'rak - knight supreme. An honourable warrior - Vlaakith's finest!

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_42.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_42.text: I am impressed. He wanted your head, yet it remains firmly atop your shoulders.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_6.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_6.text: A lesser person would be adorning the road as a shredded corpse.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_79.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_79.text: 'Impressive?' That's the nicest thing you've ever said to me.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_90.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_90.text: If by 'nice' you mean 'truthful', then consider me positively pleasant.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_73.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_73.text: Aren't you upset that I killed your fellow gith?

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_14.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_14.text: Why should I mourn a sarth who failed Jhe'stil Kith'rak's orders?
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_14.context: NodeContext: Sarth = as it's spelled. Zhe-STIL KITH-rack.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_105.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_105.text: Now, to the point: Voss revealed the crèche's location. We must go there immediately.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_49.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_49.text: Now, to the point: The crèche is not far from where you met Voss. We must go there immediately.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_56.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_56.text: Unless, of course, you'd rather sprout waxy tendrils where there were no tendrils before.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_76.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_76.text: And if Kith'rak Voss finds us before then?

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_45.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_45.text: Keep me at your side, and I will invoke protocol. It is my people's duty to aid infected githyanki.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_35.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_35.text: Had I been travelling with you, we might have avoided the knight's fury.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_57.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_57.text: Now, to the point: The crèche cannot be far from where you met Voss. We must go there immediately.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_92.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_92.text: We should go to the crèche as soon as possible.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_87.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_87.text: Lead, then. Take us to our cure.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_83.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_83.text: The knight seeks a 'weapon'. It's the artefact that we carry.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_69.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_69.text: As I'd expect. Ancient githyanki symbols adorn the artefact's face.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_86.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_86.text: We can deliver it to a kith'rak or varsh at the first opportunity.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_29.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_29.text: The crèche is not far from where you met Voss. We must go there at immediately.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_53.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_53.text: The crèche cannot be far from where you met Voss. We must go there immediately.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_9.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_9.text: He would have made a valuable ally. Instead, he watches from the skies like a falcon - and we are his prey.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_71.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_71.text: Tsk'va - an unexpected complication. I am vexed. And moreso, impressed.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_30.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_30.text: Yet your head remains firmly atop your shoulders.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_96.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_96.text: He'd have led us right to the crèche. Instead, he watches from the skies like a falcon - and we are his prey.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_39.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_39.text: Voss dishonours protocol. He dishonours the regent queen Vlaakith. He dishonours me.
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_39.context: NodeContext: Seething but not too much.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_43.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_43.text: Protocol Two-thousand-ten: 'No kith'rak shall intentionally harm Vlaakith's faithful in the course of a hunt.'

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_19.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_19.text: Cool off and show me some respect or we're done here.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_46.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_46.text: You want my respect? Earn it.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_102.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_102.text: A kith'rak demanded my head. He'd deny me a cure.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_37.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_37.text: The kith'rak is consumed by his hunt. He'd have taken my life, given the chance.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_62.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_62.text: And yet you say nothing. You should rage at this heresy, and scream for his head!

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_75.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_75.text: How dare he speak my queen's name!  How dare he dishonour her child!

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_78.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_78.text: You are right to be angry. The kith'rak is a danger.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_8.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_8.text: He demanded our heads. He'd deny us a cure.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_64.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_64.text: This accursed weapon has distorted his loyalty. He'd sever our heads, given the chance.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_11.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_11.text: The kith'rak demands the fugitives' heads. I should have given him yours.

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_74.speaker: Player
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_74.text: What the hells happened back there with the dragon-rider?

WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_98.speaker: Lae'zel
WRD_LaezelAfterVossAtChokepoint_98.text: The kith'rak is consumed by his hunt. He'd have taken my head, given the chance.
